Title: The Secret Policeman's Other Ball
Actors: Rowan Atkinson, Jeff Beck, Alan Bennett, John Bird
Plot: The film of an on-stage charity benefit for Amnesty International. The show includes comedy skits by the members of Monty Python, as well as noted comedians Peter Cook, Rowan Atkinson, and others. The show also includes musical numbers by Eric Clapton, Sting, Donovan and Bob Geldof.
